As integrais exatas foram calculadas utilizando o site [emathhelp.net](emathhelp.net).

```{r}
n <- 5000
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```

Seja $X \sim U(0, 1)$, $f_X(x) = 1$ e $g(x) = (1 - x^2)^{3/2}$. Assim, $\int_0^1(1 - x^2)^{3/2}dx = \int_0^1g(x)f_X(x)dx = E[g(X)]$. Pela LFrGN, $\frac{1}{n} \sum_1^n g(X_i) \xrightarrow{P} E[g(X_i)]$, onde $X_i \sim X$.

```{r}

rexp_truncada <- function(n, rate = 1, lower = 0, upper = Inf) {
  result <- numeric(5000)
  
  for(i in seq_along(result)) {
    y <- rexp(rate)
    while(y < lower | y > upper) y <- rexp(rate)
    result[i] <- y
  }
  
  return(result)
}
```

```{r}
tabela1 <-
  data.frame(
    Integral = c(
      '$\\int_0^1(1 - x^2)^{3/2}dx$',
      '$\\int_{-2}^{2} e^{x + x^2} dx$',
      '$\\int_{0}^{\\pi/3} \\sin(x) dx$',
      '$\\int_{0}^{1} \\frac{e^{-x}}{1 + x^2}dx$',
      '$\\int_{0}^{1} \\frac{e^{-x}}{1 + x^2}dx$'
    ),
    distx = c(
      '$U(0,1)$',
      '$U(-2, 2)$',  
      '$U(0, \\frac{\\pi}{3})$',
      '$U(0,1)$',
      '$exp_{(0, 1)}(1)$'
    ),
    f = c(
      '$\\mathbb{1}_{(0, 1)}(x)$',
      '$\\frac{1}{4} \\mathbb{1}_{(-2, 2)}(x)$',
      '$\\frac{3}{\\pi} \\mathbb{1}_{(0, \\frac{\\pi}{3})}(x)$',
      '$\\mathbb{1}_{(0, 1)}(x)$',
      '$\\frac{e^{-x}}{F_{exp(1)}(1)} \\mathbb{1}_{(0, 1)}(x)$'
    ),
    g = c(
      '$(1 - x^2)^{3/2}$',
      '$4e^{x + x^2}$',
      '$\\frac{\\pi}{3} \\sin(x)$',
      '$\\frac{e^{-x}}{1+x^2}$',
      '$\\frac{F_{exp(1)}(1)}{1+x^2}$'
    ),
    Site = c(
      0.589043,
      93.16275,
      0.5,
      0.52479,
      0.52479
    )
  )

lista_g <- list(
  a = function(x) (1-x^2)^(3/2),
  b = function(x) 4*exp(x+x^2),
  c = function(x) pi / 3 * sin(x),
  d1 = function(x) exp(-x) / (1 + x^2),
  d2 = function(x)1/(1+x^2) * pexp(1)
)

lista_gerar_f <- list(
  a = expr(runif(n)),
  b = expr(runif(n, -2, 2)),
  c = expr(runif(n, 0, (3 / pi))),
  d1 = expr(runif(n)),
  d2 = expr(rexp_truncada(n, upper = 1))
)

result <- numeric(5)

for(i in seq_along(lista_g)) {
  g <- lista_g[[i]]
  g <- Vectorize(g)
  
  sim_f <- eval(lista_gerar_f[[i]])
  result[i] <- mean(g(sim_f))
}

tabela1[['Monte Carlo']] <- result

kable(tabela1, col.names = c('Integral', 'Dist. X', 'f(x)', 'g(x)', 'Site', 'Monte Carlo'))
```

```{r}
x <- runif(n)
y <- runif(n)

g <- function(x, y) exp(x + y)

dados <- expand_grid(x, y) %>%
  mutate(g = exp(x + y))

sum(dados$g) / n^2
```

```{r}
tabela2 <- data.frame(
  Integral = c(
    '$\\int_{0}^{1} \\left(\\int_{0}^{1} e^{x+y}dx \\right) dy$',
    '$\\int_{0}^{1/3} \\left(\\int_{0}^{2/3} x^3 y^2 (1- x - y)^6dx \\right) dy$'
  ),
  distxy = c(
    '$U(0,1)$'
  ),
  disty = c(
    '$U(0, 1)'
  ),
  fx = c(
    '$\\mathbb{1}_{(0, 1)}(x)$'
  ),
  fy = c(
    '$\\mathbb{1}_{(0, 1)}(y)$'
  ),
  g = c(
    '$e^{x + y}$'
  ),
  externo = c(
    2.952492
  )
)

lista_gerar_fx <- list(
  e = expr(runif(n))
)

lista_gerar_fy <- list(
  e = expr(runif(n))
)

lista_g <- list(
  e = function(x, y) exp(x + y)
)

result <- numeric(2)

for(i in seq_along(lista_gerar_fx)) {
  sim_x <- eval(lista_gerar_fx[[i]])
  sim_y <- eval(lista_gerar_fy[[i]])
  
  
  
  fun_g <- lista_g[[i]]
  fun_g <- Vectorize(fun_g)
  
  dados <- expand_grid(x = sim_x, y = sim_y) %>%
    mutate(g = fun_g(x, y))
  
  result[i] <- sum(dados$g) / n^2
}
```
